mapper.insert:
insert into qna values (QNA_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{category},#{qnaTitle},#{qnaContent},to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'','','','')
select max("qna_no") from qna
mapper.select: select "qna_no"as qnaNo, "member_id"as memberId, "category"as category, "qna_title"as qnaTitle, "qna_content"as qnaContent, "reg_date"as regDate, "filename"as filename, "filepath"as filepath, "qna_answer" as qnaAnswer, "answer_date"as answerDate from qna order by 1 desc

select "non_qna_no"as nonQnaNo, "category" as category, "email" as email, "qna_pw"as qnaPw, "qna_title"as qnaTitle, "qna_content" as qnaContent, "reg_date"as regDate, "qna_answer" as qnaAnwer, "answer_date" as answerDate from non_member_qna order by 1 desc
